underlying_goal: Fix UI and state management issues in a content publishing app: ensure approve button shows correctly, un-approving updates post status, fix connector line alignment/styling, and push changes
friction_detail: First attempt at fixing the connector line positioning didn't fully resolve the issue - the line overlapped the icon and had inconsistent color, requiring a second iteration.
brief_summary: User needed to fix approval state management, UI connector line alignment, and color consistency in a content publishing app, and all issues were resolved iteratively across frontend and backend.
